author: Ivonne Jocelyn Rivera Alvarado
photographer: Ivonne Jocelyn Rivera Alvarado, Tec de Monterrey, Mexico
description: 40-year-old female, asymptomatic, without history of trauma. VA 20/20. No comorbilities. No ophthalmologic surgeries. It was a incidental finding. It can be observed a large RPE hypertrophy at the nasal retinal zone that borders the optic nerve with a line of demarcation that corresponds to a self applied retinal detachment.
